pages.title: Jyamar Garden
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats (2022, TV show)$(br2)Spawn locations: Jungle, Bamboo Jungle, Sparse Jungle$(br2)Chest loot:$(li)3-7 $(l:geats/items/blank_rider_core_id)Blank Rider Core ID$(/l) (20%)$(li)4-6 Bones (10%)$(li)1 Iron Hoe (8%)$(li)1 Gold Hoe (6%)$(li)1 Diamond Hoe (4%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/togechi_rider_core_id)Kamen Rider Togetchi Core ID$(/l) (4%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/lancer_rider_core_id)Kamen Rider Lancer Core ID$(/l) (4%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/garun_rider_core_id)Kamen Rider Garun Core ID$(/l) (4%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/togechi_rider_core_id_cracked)Kamen Rider Togetchi Core ID (Cracked)$(/l) (6%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/letter_rider_core_id_cracked)Kamen Rider Letter Core ID (Cracked)$(/l) (6%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/nudge_sparrow_rider_core_id_cracked)Kamen Rider Nadge-Sparrow Core ID (Cracked)$(/l) (6%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/ginpen_rider_core_id_cracked)Kamen Rider Ginpen Core ID (Cracked)$(/l) (6%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/shirowe_rider_core_id_cracked)Kamen Rider Shirowe Core ID (Cracked)$(/l) (6%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/ziin_raise_riser_card)Raise Riser Card (Ziin)$(/l) (2%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/kekera_raise_riser_card)Raise Riser Card (Kekera)$(/l) (2%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/beroba_raise_riser_card)Raise Riser Card (Beroba)$(/l) (2%)$(li)1 $(l:geats/items/jyamato_buckle)Jyamato Buckle$(/l) (2%)
